item.description:
For more info visit this website: http://www.explorenor...
Haymarket has yummy hot chocolate! We'll meet there at 5:30, head out about 6:00. There's 23 open galleries and studios that will provide light refreshments until 8:00. Bring your fabulous self and I'll provide some Arts Walk maps for everyone. Let's check out the dinner scene while we meander through town. I know we'll find something we'll all enjoy.
item.how_to_find_us: I'll have a meetup sign on the table. I'll try to get an upstairs table but if you don't see me, look downstairs. If no table, I'll wear the meetup sign around my neck :)
item.why: We'll do the Arts Walk and find a cool place to eat.
item.name: Noho Gallery Walk & Dinner
